GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:articles_id.description: returns an object representing the article specified by the inputted article_id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: returns an array of comments that have been made about a given article with a specified article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: takes an article_id, a username, and a comment body, and posts the comment body as a new comment for the specificed article;  the inputted username appears under 'author' on the comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: takes an article, specified by ID, ammends the number of votes by a given amount included in the body of the request (e.g. {inc_votes: 12}), and returns the newly-ammended article

DELETE /api/comments/:comments_id.description: takes a comment_id and deletes the existing comment with that ID
